title: QUIT SMOKING WITH NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS / HYPNOTIC INDUCTION
description:
This woman is one of Dr. Marco Paret's students from his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass. She had the bad habit of smoking that she wanted to quit. Dr. Paret demonstrates non-verbal hypnosis technique that makes the subject enter in a deep trance state of hypnotic induction. After this non-verbal hypnotic experience, the subject is asked about smoking and her response is "No!".  Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
